description: 是否对《环太平洋》中的巨型机甲垂涎不已？这款由日本水道桥重工出品的高3.8米重达5吨的大型战斗机器人让你能和电影中一样真正置身其中进行操控，在铁甲和重拳的加持下将中二进行到底
content: Prepare yourself for intergalactic space battles by slipping into the life size Japanese battle robot. You’ll be able to make your childhood dreams a reality by actually sitting inside this giant warrior and controlling its movements.
